titles.title: Trade with China Strategic Assessment Act of 2022
Trade with China Strategic Assessment Act of 2022
A bill to require a report on the state of economic integration between the United States and the People's Republic of China.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Trade with China Strategic Assessment Act of 2022
This bill directs the Department of Commerce to report to Congress on the state of economic integration between the United States and China.
